help-file.title: WARLOCK
help-file.content:
Warlocks are malevolent practitioners of dark, forbidden magics that have only been mastered by the Undead. Their powers are based neither in the conventional magics practiced by mortals, nor in the power of the mind like the illithids. Warlocks tap into the dark realm of the negative material plane, but the greater part of their energy comes from the bowels of hell itself. The nature of their power not only vanquishes their enemies, it also increases the Warlock's own power and energy. Any simple mortal attempting to dabble in such horrid sorcery would almost surely be annihilated immediately.
Allowable races: Vampire, Lich, Shade
Innate Abilities: No class-specific innate abilities.
Equipment usage: Warlock fall under the Priest classification of item restriction. This means they are restricted to use of non-edged weapons such as maces, clubs and staves. They can wear almost any type of armor, but are mildly restricted in the use of miscellaneous magical items.
